name: Lonely Mountains: Downhill - Redmoor Falls
description:
Gear up for a trip around the lost trail of Redmoor Peaks in this free DLC.

Take a chance on the new challenges to win the water elemental customization set.

Features:
- One trail with exciting challenges and two resting places awaits you
- Gear up with new outfits, backpacks and paint job from the water elemental set
- Experience the beauty of Redmoor Peaks on the all-new trail
- Make a name for yourself on the leaderboard

Return to the Lonely Mountains once again with Redmoor Falls.
